items.name: OpenAssetIO
items.description: An open-source interoperability standard for tools and content management systems used in media production.

items.name: usdOpenAssetIOResolver
items.description: An AR2 plugin that hosts OpenAssetIO

items.name: OpenAssetIO-MediaCreation
items.description: OpenAssetIO extensions for use in the Media Creation industry.

items.name: otio-openassetio
items.description: A prototype OpenTimelineIO plugin to allow assetized EDLs to be resolved through OpenAssetIO.

items.name: OpenAssetIO-Manager-BAL
items.description: A contrived "asset management system" for OpenAssetIO integration test cases.

items.name: OpenAssetIO-TraitGen
items.description: A code generation tool that produces OpenAssetIO Traits and Specifications from a simple YAML description.

items.name: OpenAssetIO-WG
items.description: Proceedings from the various OpenAssetIO working groups and meetings.

items.name: OpenAssetIO-Test-CMake
items.description: Simple test project that consumes OpenAssetIO as a CMake package
